LanguageData.AgeReversal_Demanded.label: Demanded
LanguageData.AgeReversal_Demanded.description: Why get old? If over age 25, one must have a once-yearly age reversal treatment in the biosculpter pod.
LanguageData.BioSculpter_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.BioSculpter_Despised.description: Biosculpter pods violate the purity human flesh and should never be used.
LanguageData.Biosculpting_Accelerated.label: Accelerated
LanguageData.Biosculpting_Accelerated.description: All biosculpting cycles take half the usual time.
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.NeuralSupercharge_Preferred.description: Having a neural supercharge is the new standard. Without it, you're obsolete.
LanguageData.SleepAccelerator_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.SleepAccelerator_Preferred.description: One should always use a sleep accelerator. Slow-sleeping is just foolishly wasting your potential.
